title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.25 - Title and lien information requests
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.25 - Title and lien information requests

State Regulations
A request for a lien record or certificate of title
information should be submitted to the Title Bureau, Department of Motor

Vehicles, South Mall, Albany, NY 12228, using lien record vehicle information
request form (Form MV-905) appropriately completed with the appropriate fee. Information on file will be provided on a vehicle title record (Form
MV-904). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
20.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
